headline.main: Captured Missionaries' Family Prays and Waits

lead_paragraph: After seeing a picture of her mother's sallow face beamed over the Internet the other night, 12-year-old Mindy Burnham changed her bedtime prayer. Instead of asking for the release of her parents, missionaries being held hostage by Muslim militants in the Philippines, she just begged God to stop their suffering. ''She looked like she was in pain,'' Mindy said in her new bedroom here, flipping through a scrapbook of family snapshots. ''No matter if they die or come home, I prayed not to let them suffer anymore.''
